inputs.name: azure-ai-project-endpoint
inputs.label: Azure AI Project Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: The endpoint for the Azure AI Project. This is used to connect to Azure AI Foundry to simulate conversations with each agent, and to connect to the Azure AI Evaluation SDK to perform the evaluation.

inputs.name: deployment-name
inputs.label: Deployment Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Azure AI model deployment to use for evaluation.

inputs.name: data-path
inputs.label: Input Data Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the input data file containing the conversation starters. Each conversation starter will be sent to each agent for a pairwise comparison of evaluation results.

inputs.name: agent-ids
inputs.label: Agent IDs
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-separated list of agent IDs to evaluate.

inputs.name: baseline-agent-id
inputs.label: Baseline Agent ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Agent ID of the baseline agent to compare against. By default, the first agent is used.

inputs.name: evaluation-result-view
inputs.label: Evaluation Result View
inputs.helpMarkDown: The evaluation result view. Options are "default" (boolean scores only such as passing and defect rates), "all-scores" (all scores), "raw-scores-only" (all non-boolean scores)

inputs.name: api-version
inputs.label: API Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The API version to use when connecting to model deployment.
